text: lys 'iqsamhm lqasd hasan wtlbana llhq, wa'iinama hu astkbar fi al'ard ealaa alkhlq, yuridun bih almakr alsyiy walkhidae walbatl, wala yahiq almakr alsyiy 'iilaa bahlh, fahal yantazir almstkbrwn almakrwn 'iilaa aleadhab aladhi nazal bamthalhm aladhin sbqwhm, falan tajid ltryqt allah tabdilana wala tahwilana fala yastatie 'ahad 'an yubaddil, wala 'ana yuhawwil aleadhab ean nafsih 'aw ghyrh
